root.name: The Flintstones: Burgertime in Bedrock
root.description: OverviewThe Flintstones: BurgerTime in Bedrock is a Flintstones themed entry in the BurgerTime franchise. The Flintstones: BurgerTime in Bedrock was developed by Conspiracy Entertainment and published by Swing! Entertainment (European versions) and Electro Source (US version) for the Game Boy Color platform.
